features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensure your website looks great on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

features.name: SEO Optimization
features.description: Improve your website's visibility in search engine results.

features.name: Analytics Integration
features.description: Track and analyze your website's traffic and user behavior.

features.name: Blog Section
features.description: Add a fully-featured blog to your website to share content and engage visitors.

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Allow visitors to easily get in touch with you through a custom contact form.

services.name: Web Hosting (per year)
services.description: Reliable and fast hosting for your website on our secure servers.

services.name: Monthly Maintenance
services.description: Regular updates and maintenance to keep your website running smoothly.

services.name: Security Package
services.description: Advanced security measures to protect your website from threats and attacks.

services.name: Daily Backups
services.description: Automatic daily backups of your website to prevent data loss.

services.name: 24/7 Support
services.description: Round-the-clock support for any issues or questions you may have.
